懒得做图了，我就先翻译一下断绝父子关系的那个吧
Disclaimer: I shall not be held responsible in any way, legal, political, or otherwise, for the radical comments by the Chinese "little pinkos" or communist symuntrusted fake 2049bbs（钓鱼网站）lish language.

Here goes:

Because my old man said he would keep supporting Houston Rockets, I emancipated from him.

Dad doesn't have a lot of hobbies, but he sure is into basketball. He's been following the Rockets since Yao Ming was at his prime, for about a dozen years. I told him about Morey's Tweet, but he didn't give a shit at all. He even added: what their manager said wasn't the Rockets' business and he would always be their fan. I flipped out right away, arguing with him all morning. Now I'm severing all ties with that old bastard and I won't come back if he doesn't apologize. The country is more important that family, or anything else for that matter. I ain't got no more to say. Alas, boy am I upset at the end of our holidays.


(This is NOT trolling. Shit's fucking real)
